description:
The Manual version of the chaotic kitchen and restaurant management game from 2022: PlateUp! 

Can you get to Overtime on a configurable amount of main dishes
[Apworld Version: 1.3.1]

PlateUpv1.0.description:
## What's Changed
* Ap update to 0.4.4 by @nicopop in https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/pull/18
* Add Manual plateup Apworld by @nicopop in https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/pull/19


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/compare/v6.1.0...PlateUpv1.0
PlateUpv1.0.title: PlateUp Aworld V1.0

PlateUpv1.3.description:
## What's Changed
* PU updated to 2024-04-23 Manual source by @nicopop in https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/pull/22
* PU version 1.2.0-Async by @nicopop in https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/pull/25
- Added Goals:
    - Hit your Quota: Beat day 15 of >= number of recipes than what you chose in 'Recipe % needed to Win' 
    - Get Every Enabled Tokens: Beat every enabled recipes's day 15 
    - Randomly chosen Recipes: Out of every Enabled recipes, 'Recipe % needed to Win'% will have a Victory Token
    - Randomly placed tokens: a token for every enabled recipes can be found anywhere local. Aka McGuffin mode.
    - Chaos McGuffin Mode: like Randomly placed tokens but double the amount and can be non local, only 'Recipe % needed to Win'% is required
* PU version 1.3.0 by @nicopop in https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/pull/26
- Added the new Tacos recipe (requirement untested)
- Changed how recipe options work by making them dynamically generated when a "Food recipe" item is detected.
- Fixed the Chaos Token goal so it wont try to place more token than there's locations
  - Recommend to play this with other games because it **_will_** replace a lot of locations with a token
- Updated the base files to the latest source of Manual as of 2024-10-16

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/compare/PlateUpv1.0...PlateUpv1.3
PlateUpv1.3.title: PlateUp Aworld V1.3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nicopop/NicosManualApworlds/compare/PlateUpv1.3...PlateUpv1.3.1-fix
